To see [her]28-miss jessel , without a convulsion of [her]28-miss jessel small pink face , not even feign to glance in the direction of the prodigy [I]0-i announced , but only , instead of that , turn at _ [me]0-i _ an expression of hard , still gravity , an expression absolutely new and unprecedented and that appeared to read and accuse and judge [me]0-i — this was a stroke that somehow converted [the little girl]125-the little girl [herself]125-the little girl into the very presence that could make [me]0-i quail . [I]0-i quailed even though [my]0-i certitude that [she]28-miss jessel thoroughly saw was never greater than at that instant , and in the immediate need to defend [myself]0-i [I]0-i called it passionately to witness . “ [She]28-miss jessel ’s there , [you]28-miss jessel little unhappy thing — there , there , _ there _ , and [you]28-miss jessel see [her]28-miss jessel as well as [you]28-miss jessel see [me]0-i ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i had said shortly before to [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose that [she]28-miss jessel was not at these times [a child]53-a child , but [an old , old woman]1339-an old , old woman , and that description of [her]28-miss jessel could not have been more strikingly confirmed than in the way in which , for all answer to this , [she]28-miss jessel simply showed [me]0-i , without a concession , an admission , of [her]28-miss jessel eyes , a countenance of deeper and deeper , of indeed suddenly quite fixed , reprobation . [I]0-i was by this time — if [I]0-i can put the whole thing at all together — more appalled at what [I]0-i may properly call [her]28-miss jessel manner than at anything else , though it was simultaneously with this that [I]0-i became aware of having [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose also , and very formidably , to reckon with . [[My]0-i elder companion]892-my elder companion , the next moment , at any rate , blotted out everything but [her]28-miss jessel own flushed face and [her]28-miss jessel loud , shocked protest , a burst of high disapproval . “ What a dreadful turn , to be sure , [miss]1042-miss ! Where on earth do [you]28-miss jessel see anything ? ”[28-miss jessel]

[I]0-i could only grasp [her]28-miss jessel more quickly yet , for even while [she]28-miss jessel spoke [the hideous plain presence]893-the hideous plain presence stood undimmed and undaunted . It had already lasted a minute , and it lasted while [I]0-i continued , seizing [[my]0-i colleague]223-my colleague , quite thrusting [her]28-miss jessel at it and presenting [her]28-miss jessel to it , to insist with [my]0-i pointing hand . “ [You]0-i do n’t see [her]28-miss jessel exactly as _ [we]1346-we _ [see?—you]0-i mean to say [you]0-i do n’t now—_now ? _ [She]28-miss jessel ’s as big as a blazing fire ! Only look , [dearest woman]1347-dearest woman , _ look _ — ! ”[28-miss jessel] [She]28-miss jessel looked , even as [I]0-i did , and gave [me]0-i , with [her]28-miss jessel deep groan of negation , repulsion , compassion — the mixture with [her]28-miss jessel pity of [her]28-miss jessel relief at [her]28-miss jessel exemption — a sense , touching to [me]0-i even then , that [she]28-miss jessel would have backed [me]0-i up if [she]28-miss jessel could . [I]0-i might well have needed that , for with this hard blow of the proof that [her]28-miss jessel eyes were hopelessly sealed [I]0-i felt [my]0-i own situation horribly crumble , [I]0-i felt — [I]0-i saw — [my]0-i livid predecessor press , from [her]28-miss jessel position , on [my]0-i defeat , and [I]0-i was conscious , more than all , of what [I]0-i should have from this instant to deal with in the astounding little attitude of [Flora]16-flora . Into this attitude [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose immediately and violently entered , breaking , even while there pierced through [my]0-i sense of ruin a prodigious private triumph , into breathless reassurance .

“ [She]28-miss jessel is n’t [there]1025-there , [little lady]1349-little lady , and [nobody]1017-nobody ’s [there]1025-there — and [you]1015-the child never see nothing , [[my]14-mrs. grose sweet]1352-my sweet ! How can [poor [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel]1353-poor miss jessel — when poor [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel ’s dead and buried ? _ [We]896-we _ know , do n’t [we]896-we , love?”—and[14-mrs. grose] [she]14-mrs. grose appealed , blundering in , to [the child]1015-the child . “ It ’s all a mere mistake and a worry and a joke — and [we]896-we ’ll go [home]1024-home as fast as [we]896-we can ! ”[14-mrs. grose]

[[Our]896-we companion]192-our companion , on this , had responded with a strange , quick primness of propriety , and [they]898-they were again , with [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose on [her]14-mrs. grose feet , united , as it were , in pained opposition to [me]0-i . [Flora]16-flora continued to fix [me]0-i with [her]16-flora small mask of reprobation , and even at that minute [I]0-i prayed [God]12-god to forgive [me]0-i for seeming to see that , as [she]16-flora stood there holding tight to [[our]896-we friend]62-our friend ’s dress , [her]16-flora incomparable childish beauty had suddenly failed , had quite vanished . [I]0-i ’ve said it already — [she]16-flora was literally , [she]16-flora was hideously , hard ; [she]16-flora had turned common and almost ugly . “ [I]16-flora do n’t know what [you]16-flora mean . [I]16-flora see [nobody]1017-nobody . [I]16-flora see nothing . [I]16-flora never _ have _ . [I]16-flora think [you]16-flora ’re cruel . [I]16-flora do n’t like [you]16-flora ! ”[16-flora] Then , after this deliverance , which might have been that of [a vulgarly pert little girl in [the street]901-the street]900-a vulgarly pert little girl in the street , [she]16-flora hugged [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose more closely and buried in [her]16-flora skirts the dreadful little face . In this position [she]16-flora produced an almost furious wail . “ Take [me]16-flora away , take [me]16-flora away — oh , take [me]16-flora away from _ [her]16-flora ! _ ”[16-flora]

“ From _ [me]0-i ? _ ”[0-i] [I]0-i panted .

“ From [you]0-i — from [you]0-i ! ”[16-flora] [she]16-flora cried .

Even [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose looked across at [me]0-i dismayed , while [I]0-i had nothing to do but communicate again with the figure that , on [the opposite bank]902-the opposite bank , without a movement , as rigidly still as if catching , beyond the interval , [our]903-our voices , was as vividly there for [my]0-i disaster as it was not there for [my]0-i service . [The wretched child]904-the wretched child had spoken exactly as if [she]904-the wretched child had got from some outside source each of [her]904-the wretched child stabbing little words , and [I]0-i could therefore , in the full despair of all [I]0-i had to accept , but sadly shake [my]0-i head at [her]904-the wretched child . “ If [I]904-the wretched child had ever doubted , all [my]904-the wretched child doubt would at present have gone . [I]904-the wretched child ’ve been living with the miserable truth , and now it has only too much closed round [me]904-the wretched child . Of course [I]904-the wretched child ’ve lost [you]904-the wretched child : [I]904-the wretched child ’ve interfered , and [you]904-the wretched child ’ve seen — under _ [her]904-the wretched child _ dictation”—with[904-the wretched child] which [I]0-i faced , over [the pool]849-the pool again , [our]906-our infernal witness—“the easy and perfect way to meet it . [I]0-i ’ve done [my]0-i best , but [I]0-i ’ve lost [you]904-the wretched child . Goodbye . ”[0-i] For [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose [I]0-i had an imperative , an almost frantic “ Go , go ! ”[0-i] before which , in infinite distress , but mutely possessed of [the little girl]125-the little girl and clearly convinced , in spite of [her]904-the wretched child blindness , that something awful had occurred and some collapse engulfed [us]906-our , [she]904-the wretched child retreated , by the way [we]906-our had come , as fast as [she]904-the wretched child could move .

Of what first happened when [I]0-i was left alone [I]0-i had no subsequent memory . [I]0-i only knew that at the end of , [I]0-i suppose , a quarter of an hour , an odorous dampness and roughness , chilling and piercing [my]0-i trouble , had made [me]0-i understand that [I]0-i must have thrown [myself]0-i , on [my]0-i face , on the ground and given way to a wildness of grief . [I]0-i must have lain there long and cried and sobbed , for when [I]0-i raised [my]0-i head the day was almost done . [I]0-i got up and looked a moment , through the twilight , at [the gray pool]908-the gray pool and [its]908-the gray pool blank , haunted edge , and then [I]0-i took , back to [the house]153-the house , [my]0-i dreary and difficult course . When [I]0-i reached the gate in the fence [the boat]1336-the boat , to [my]0-i surprise , was gone , so that [I]0-i had a fresh reflection to make on [Flora]16-flora ’s extraordinary command of the situation . [She]16-flora passed that night , by the most tacit , and [I]0-i should add , were not the word so grotesque a false note , the happiest of arrangements , with [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose . [I]0-i saw neither of [them]911-them on [my]0-i return , but , on the other hand , as by an ambiguous compensation , [I]0-i saw a great deal of [Miles]15-miles . [I]0-i saw — [I]0-i can use no other phrase — so much of [him]912-him that it was as if it were more than it had ever been . No evening [I]0-i had passed at [Bly]13-bly had the portentous quality of this one ; in spite of which — and in spite also of the deeper depths of consternation that had opened beneath [my]0-i feet — there was literally , in the ebbing actual , an extraordinarily sweet sadness . On reaching [the house]153-the house [I]0-i had never so much as looked for [the boy]1078-the boy ; [I]0-i had simply gone straight to [[my]0-i room]177-my room to change what [I]0-i was wearing and to take in , at a glance , much material testimony to [Flora]16-flora ’s rupture . [Her]16-flora little belongings had all been removed . When later , by the schoolroom fire , [I]0-i was served with tea by [the usual maid]916-the usual maid , [I]0-i indulged , on the article of [[my]0-i other pupil]1045-my other pupil , in no inquiry whatever . [He]1078-the boy had [his]1078-the boy freedom now — [he]1078-the boy might have it to the end ! Well , [he]1078-the boy did have it ; and it consisted — in part at least — of [his]1078-the boy coming in at about eight o’clock and sitting down with [me]0-i in silence . On the removal of the tea things [I]0-i had blown out the candles and drawn [my]0-i chair closer : [I]0-i was conscious of a mortal coldness and felt as if [I]0-i should never again be warm . So , when [he]1078-the boy appeared , [I]0-i was sitting in the glow with [my]0-i thoughts . [He]1078-the boy paused a moment by the door as if to look at [me]0-i ; then — as if to share them — came to the other side of the hearth and sank into a chair . [We]918-we sat there in absolute stillness ; yet [he]1078-the boy wanted , [I]0-i felt , to be with [me]0-i .

XXI

Before a new day , in [[my]0-i room]177-my room , had fully broken , [my]0-i eyes opened to [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose , who had come to [my]0-i bedside with worse news . [Flora]16-flora was so markedly feverish that an illness was perhaps at hand ; [she]16-flora had passed a night of extreme unrest , a night agitated above all by fears that had for [their]920-their subject not in the least [her]16-flora former , but wholly [her]16-flora present , governess . It was not against the possible re - entrance of [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel on the scene that [she]16-flora protested — it was conspicuously and passionately against [mine]0-i . [I]0-i was promptly on [my]0-i feet of course , and with an immense deal to ask ; the more that [[my]0-i friend]219-my friend had discernibly now girded [her]16-flora loins to meet [me]0-i once more . This [I]0-i felt as soon as [I]0-i had put to [her]16-flora the question of [her]16-flora sense of [the child]1015-the child ’s sincerity as against [my]0-i own . “ [She]16-flora persists in denying to [you]0-i that [she]16-flora saw , or has ever seen , anything ? ”[0-i]

[[My]0-i visitor]357-my visitor ’s trouble , truly , was great . “ Ah , [miss]1042-miss , it is n’t a matter on which [I]357-my visitor can push [her]16-flora ! Yet it is n’t either , [I]357-my visitor must say , as if [I]357-my visitor much needed to . It has made [her]16-flora , every inch of [her]16-flora , quite old . ”[357-my visitor]

“ Oh , [I]14-mrs. grose see [her]16-flora perfectly from here . [She]16-flora resents , for all [the world]185-the world like [some high little personage]1358-some high little personage , the imputation on [her]16-flora truthfulness and , as it were , [her]16-flora respectability . ‘ [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel indeed—_she ! _ ’ Ah , [she]16-flora ’s ‘ respectable , ’ [the chit]1359-the chit ! The impression [she]16-flora gave [me]14-mrs. grose there yesterday was , [I]14-mrs. grose assure [you]1360-you , the very strangest of all ; it was quite beyond any of the others . [I]14-mrs. grose _ did _ put [my]14-mrs. grose foot in it ! [She]16-flora ’ll never speak to [me]14-mrs. grose again . ”[14-mrs. grose]

Hideous and obscure as it all was , it held [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose briefly silent ; then [she]14-mrs. grose granted [my]0-i point with a frankness which , [I]0-i made sure , had more behind it . “ [I]14-mrs. grose think indeed , [miss]1042-miss , [she]16-flora never will . [She]16-flora do have a grand manner about it ! ”[14-mrs. grose]

“ And that manner”—I[14-mrs. grose] summed it up—“is practically what ’s the matter with [her]16-flora now ! ”[14-mrs. grose]

Oh , that manner , [I]0-i could see in [[my]0-i visitor]357-my visitor ’s face , and not a little else besides ! “ [She]16-flora asks [me]0-i every three minutes if [I]0-i think [you]0-i ’re coming in . ”[0-i]

“ [I]0-i see — [I]0-i see . ”[0-i] [I]0-i , too , on [my]0-i side , had so much more than worked it out . “ Has [she]16-flora said to [you]0-i since yesterday — except to repudiate [her]16-flora familiarity with anything so dreadful — a single other word about [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel ? ”[0-i]

“ Not one , [miss]1042-miss . And of course [you]0-i know , ”[219-my friend] [[my]0-i friend]219-my friend added , “ [I]219-my friend took it from [her]16-flora , by [the lake]433-the lake , that , just then and there at least , there _ was _ [nobody]1017-nobody . ”[219-my friend]

“ Rather ! and , naturally , [you]0-i take it from [her]16-flora still . ”[0-i]

“ [I]219-my friend do n’t contradict [her]16-flora . What else can [I]219-my friend do ? ”[219-my friend]

“ Nothing in [the world]185-the world ! [You]0-i ’ve [the cleverest little person to deal with]1366-the cleverest little person to deal with . [They]1367-they ’ve made [them]1367-they — [[their]1367-they two friends]1368-their two friends , [I]0-i mean — still cleverer even than nature did ; for it was wondrous material to play on ! [Flora]16-flora has now [her]16-flora grievance , and [she]16-flora ’ll work it to the end . ”[0-i]

“ Yes , [miss]1042-miss ; but to _ what _ end ? ”[219-my friend]

“ Why , that of dealing with [me]0-i to [[her]16-flora uncle]1370-her uncle . [She]16-flora ’ll make [me]0-i out to [him]1370-her uncle the lowest creature — ! ”[0-i]

[I]0-i winced at the fair show of the scene in [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose ’s face ; [she]14-mrs. grose looked for a minute as if [she]14-mrs. grose sharply saw them together . “ And [him]1370-her uncle who thinks so well of [you]0-i ! ”[14-mrs. grose]

“ [He]1370-her uncle has an odd way — it comes over [me]0-i now , ”[0-i] [I]0-i laughed , “ — of proving it ! But that does n’t matter . What [Flora]16-flora wants , of course , is to get rid of [me]0-i . ”[0-i]

[[My]0-i companion]239-my companion bravely concurred . “ Never again to so much as look at [you]0-i . ”[239-my companion]

“ So that what [you]239-my companion ’ve come to [me]0-i now for , ”[0-i] [I]0-i asked , “ is to speed [me]0-i on [my]0-i way ? ”[0-i] Before [she]239-my companion had time to reply , however , [I]0-i had [her]239-my companion in check . “ [I]239-my companion ’ve a better idea — the result of [my]239-my companion reflections . [My]239-my companion going _ would _ seem the right thing , and on Sunday [I]239-my companion was terribly near it . Yet that wo n’t do . [It]1371-it ’s _ [you]239-my companion _ who must go . [You]239-my companion must take [Flora]16-flora . ”[239-my companion]

[[My]0-i visitor]357-my visitor , at this , did speculate . “ But where in [the world]185-the world — ? ”[357-my visitor]

“ Away from [here]1080-here . Away from _ [them]1374-them _ . Away , even most of all , now , from [me]239-my companion . Straight to [[her]16-flora uncle]1370-her uncle . ”[239-my companion]

“ Only to tell on [you]0-i — ? ”[357-my visitor]

“ No , not ‘ only ’ ! To leave [me]239-my companion , in addition , with [my]239-my companion remedy . ”[239-my companion]

[She]239-my companion was still vague . “ And what _ is _ [your]0-i remedy ? ”[239-my companion]

“ [Your]0-i loyalty , to begin with . And then [Miles]15-miles ’s . ”[357-my visitor]

[She]239-my companion looked at [me]0-i hard . “ Do [you]0-i think [he]15-miles — ? ”[239-my companion]

“ Wo n’t , if [he]15-miles has the chance , turn on [me]0-i ? Yes , [I]0-i venture still to think it . At all events , [I]0-i want to try . Get off with [[his]15-miles sister]425-his sister as soon as possible and leave [me]0-i with [him]15-miles alone . ”[0-i] [I]0-i was amazed , [myself]0-i , at the spirit [I]0-i had still in reserve , and therefore perhaps a trifle the more disconcerted at the way in which , in spite of this fine example of it , [she]239-my companion hesitated . “ There ’s one thing , of course , ”[239-my companion] [I]0-i went on : “ [they]1377-they must n’t , before [she]16-flora goes , see [each other]284-each other for three seconds . ”[0-i] Then it came over [me]0-i that , in spite of [Flora]16-flora ’s presumable sequestration from the instant of [her]16-flora return from [the pool]849-the pool , it might already be too late . “ Do [you]239-my companion mean , ”[0-i] [I]0-i anxiously asked , “ that [they]1377-they _ have _ met ? ”[0-i]

At this [she]239-my companion quite flushed . “ Ah , [miss]1042-miss , [I]239-my companion ’m not such [a fool as that]1380-a fool as that ! If [I]239-my companion ’ve been obliged to leave [her]16-flora three or four times , it has been each time with [one of [the maids]830-the maids]1381-one of the maids , and at present , though [she]16-flora ’s alone , [she]16-flora ’s locked in safe . And yet — and yet ! ”[239-my companion] There were too many things .

“ And yet what ? ”[239-my companion]

“ Well , are [you]239-my companion so sure of [the little gentleman]1043-the little gentleman ? ”[239-my companion]

“ [I]239-my companion ’m not sure of anything but _ [you]239-my companion _ . But [I]239-my companion have , since last evening , a new hope . [I]239-my companion think [he]1043-the little gentleman wants to give [me]239-my companion an opening . [I]239-my companion do believe that — [poor little exquisite wretch!—he]1384-poor little exquisite wretch!—he wants to speak . Last evening , in the firelight and the silence , [he]1043-the little gentleman sat with [me]239-my companion for two hours as if it were just coming . ”[239-my companion]

[Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose looked hard , through the window , at the gray , gathering day . “ And did it come ? ”[14-mrs. grose]

“ No , though [I]0-i waited and waited , [I]0-i confess it did n’t , and it was without a breach of the silence or so much as a faint allusion to [[his]1043-the little gentleman sister]425-his sister ’s condition and absence that [we]1386-we at last kissed for good night . All the same , ”[0-i] [I]0-i continued , “ [I]0-i ca n’t , if [[her]425-his sister uncle]1370-her uncle sees [her]425-his sister , consent to [his]1370-her uncle seeing [[her]425-his sister brother]426-her brother without [my]0-i having given [the boy]1078-the boy — and most of all because things have got so bad — a little more time . ”[0-i]

[[My]0-i friend]219-my friend appeared on this ground more reluctant than [I]0-i could quite understand . “ What do [you]219-my friend mean by more time ? ”[219-my friend]

“ Well , a day or two — really to bring it out . [He]1078-the boy ’ll then be on _ [my]0-i _ side — of which [you]219-my friend see the importance . If nothing comes , [I]0-i shall only fail , and [you]219-my friend will , at the worst , have helped [me]0-i by doing , on [your]219-my friend arrival in [town]1018-town , whatever [you]219-my friend may have found possible . ”[0-i] So [I]0-i put it before [her]219-my friend , but [she]219-my friend continued for a little so inscrutably embarrassed that [I]0-i came again to [her]219-my friend aid . “ Unless , indeed , ”[0-i] [I]0-i wound up , “ [you]219-my friend really want _ not _ to go . ”[0-i]

[I]0-i could see it , in [her]219-my friend face , at last clear itself ; [she]219-my friend put out [her]219-my friend hand to [me]0-i as a pledge . “ [I]219-my friend ’ll go — [I’ll]219-my friend go . [I]219-my friend ’ll go this morning . ”[219-my friend]

[I]0-i wanted to be very just . “ If [you]219-my friend _ should _ wish still to wait , [I]0-i would engage [she]219-my friend should n’t see [me]0-i . ”[0-i]

“ No , no : it ’s [the place itself]1391-the place itself . [She]219-my friend must leave [it]1391-the place itself . ”[219-my friend] [She]219-my friend held [me]0-i a moment with heavy eyes , then brought out the rest . “ [Your]0-i idea ’s the right one . [I]219-my friend [myself]219-my friend , [miss]1042-miss — ”[219-my friend]

“ Well ? ”[0-i]

“ [I]219-my friend ca n’t stay . ”[219-my friend]

The look [she]219-my friend gave [me]0-i with it made [me]0-i jump at possibilities . “ [You]0-i mean that , since yesterday , [you]0-i _ have _ seen — ? ”[219-my friend]

[She]219-my friend shook [her]219-my friend head with dignity . “ [I]219-my friend ’ve _ heard _ — ! ”[219-my friend]

“ Heard ? ”[219-my friend]

“ From [that child]1337-that child — horrors ! There ! ”[219-my friend] [she]219-my friend sighed with tragic relief . “ On [my]219-my friend honor , [miss]1042-miss , [she]1337-that child says things — ! ”[219-my friend] But at this evocation [she]219-my friend broke down ; [she]219-my friend dropped , with a sudden sob , upon [my]0-i sofa and , as [I]0-i had seen [her]219-my friend do before , gave way to all the grief of it .

It was quite in another manner that [I]0-i , for [my]0-i part , let [myself]0-i go . “ Oh , thank [God]12-god ! ”[0-i]

[She]219-my friend sprang up again at this , drying [her]219-my friend eyes with a groan . “ ‘ Thank [God]12-god ’ ? ”[219-my friend]

“ It so justifies [me]219-my friend ! ”[219-my friend]

“ It does that , [miss]1042-miss ! ”[219-my friend]

[I]0-i could n’t have desired more emphasis , but [I]0-i just hesitated . “ [She]1337-that child ’s so horrible ? ”[0-i]

[I]0-i saw [[my]0-i colleague]223-my colleague scarce knew how to put it . “ Really shocking . ”[0-i]

“ And about [me]219-my friend ? ”[219-my friend]

“ About [you]1042-miss , [miss]1042-miss — since [you]1042-miss must have it . It ’s beyond everything , for [a young lady]1397-a young lady ; and [I]0-i ca n’t think wherever [she]1337-that child must have picked up — ”[0-i]

“ The appalling language [she]1337-that child applied to [me]0-i ? [I]0-i can , then ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i broke in with a laugh that was doubtless significant enough .

It only , in truth , left [[my]0-i friend]219-my friend still more grave . “ Well , perhaps [I]403-the poor woman ought to also — since [I]403-the poor woman ’ve heard some of it before ! Yet [I]403-the poor woman ca n’t bear it , ”[403-the poor woman] [the poor woman]403-the poor woman went on while , with the same movement , [she]403-the poor woman glanced , on [my]0-i dressing table , at the face of [my]0-i watch . “ But [I]403-the poor woman must go back . ”[403-the poor woman]

[I]0-i kept [her]403-the poor woman , however . “ Ah , if [you]403-the poor woman ca n’t bear it — ! ”[0-i]

“ How can [I]403-the poor woman stop with [her]403-the poor woman , [you]403-the poor woman mean ? Why , just _ for _ that : to get [her]403-the poor woman away . Far from this , ”[403-the poor woman] [she]403-the poor woman pursued , “ far from _ [them]933-them _ — ”[403-the poor woman]

“ [She]403-the poor woman may be different ? [She]403-the poor woman may be free ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i seized [her]403-the poor woman almost with joy . “ Then , in spite of yesterday , [you]403-the poor woman _ believe _ — ”[0-i]

“ In such doings ? ”[403-the poor woman] [Her]403-the poor woman simple description of [them]933-them required , in the light of [her]403-the poor woman expression , to be carried no further , and [she]403-the poor woman gave [me]0-i the whole thing as [she]403-the poor woman had never done . “ [I]403-the poor woman believe . ”[403-the poor woman]

Yes , it was a joy , and [we]934-we were still shoulder to shoulder : if [I]0-i might continue sure of that [I]0-i should care but little what else happened . [My]0-i support in the presence of disaster would be the same as it had been in [my]0-i early need of confidence , and if [[my]0-i friend]219-my friend would answer for [my]0-i honesty , [I]0-i would answer for all the rest . On the point of taking leave of [her]403-the poor woman , nonetheless , [I]0-i was to some extent embarrassed . “ There ’s one thing , of course — it occurs to [me]0-i — to remember . [My]0-i letter , giving the alarm , will have reached [town]1018-town before [you]403-the poor woman . ”[0-i]

[I]0-i now perceived still more how [she]403-the poor woman had been beating about the bush and how weary at last it had made [her]403-the poor woman . “ [Your]403-the poor woman letter wo n’t have got [there]1025-there . [Your]403-the poor woman letter never went . ”[403-the poor woman]

“ What then became of it ? ”[403-the poor woman]

“ [Goodness]45-goodness knows ! [Master Miles]15-miles — ”[403-the poor woman]

“ Do [you]403-the poor woman mean _ [he]15-miles _ took it ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i gasped .

[She]403-the poor woman hung fire , but [she]403-the poor woman overcame [her]403-the poor woman reluctance . “ [I]403-the poor woman mean that [I]403-the poor woman saw yesterday , when [I]403-the poor woman came back with [Miss Flora]16-flora , that it was n’t where [you]403-the poor woman had put it . Later in the evening [I]403-the poor woman had the chance to question [Luke]42-luke , and [he]42-luke declared that [he]42-luke had neither noticed nor touched it . ”[403-the poor woman] [We]936-we could only exchange , on this , one of [our]936-we deeper mutual soundings , and it was [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose who first brought up the plumb with an almost elated “ [You]0-i see ! ”[14-mrs. grose]

“ Yes , [I]14-mrs. grose see that if [Miles]15-miles took it instead [he]15-miles probably will have read it and destroyed it . ”[14-mrs. grose]

“ And do n’t [you]403-the poor woman see anything else ? ”[14-mrs. grose]

[I]0-i faced [her]403-the poor woman a moment with a sad smile . “ It strikes [me]0-i that by this time [your]403-the poor woman eyes are open even wider than [mine]0-i . ”[0-i]

[They]937-they proved to be so indeed , but [she]403-the poor woman could still blush , almost , to show it . “ [I]403-the poor woman make out now what [he]15-miles must have done at [school]313-school . ”[403-the poor woman] And [she]403-the poor woman gave , in [her]403-the poor woman simple sharpness , an almost droll disillusioned nod . “ [He]15-miles stole ! ”[403-the poor woman]

[I]0-i turned it over — [I]0-i tried to be more judicial . “ Well — perhaps . ”[0-i]

[She]403-the poor woman looked as if [she]403-the poor woman found [me]0-i unexpectedly calm . “ [He]15-miles stole _ letters ! _ ”[403-the poor woman]

[She]403-the poor woman could n’t know [my]0-i reasons for a calmness after all pretty shallow ; so [I]0-i showed them off as [I]0-i might . “ [I]0-i hope then it was to more purpose than in this case ! The note , at any rate , that [I]0-i put on the table yesterday , ”[0-i] [I]0-i pursued , “ will have given [him]15-miles so scant an advantage — for it contained only the bare demand for an interview — that [he]15-miles is already much ashamed of having gone so far for so little , and that what [he]15-miles had on [his]15-miles mind last evening was precisely the need of confession . ”[0-i] [I]0-i seemed to [myself]0-i , for the instant , to have mastered it , to see it all . “ Leave [us]1401-us , leave [us”—I]46-us”—i[403-the poor woman] was already , at the door , hurrying [her]403-the poor woman off . “ [I]403-the poor woman ’ll get it out of [him]15-miles . [He]15-miles ’ll meet [me]403-the poor woman — [he’ll]15-miles confess . If [he]15-miles confesses , [he]15-miles ’s saved . And if [he]15-miles ’s saved — ”[403-the poor woman]

“ Then _ [you]0-i _ are ? ”[938-the dear woman] [The dear woman]938-the dear woman kissed [me]0-i on this , and [I]0-i took [her]403-the poor woman farewell . “ [I]403-the poor woman ’ll save [you]0-i without [him]15-miles ! ”[403-the poor woman] [she]403-the poor woman cried as [she]403-the poor woman went .

XXII

Yet it was when [she]403-the poor woman had got off — and [I]0-i missed [her]403-the poor woman on the spot — that the great pinch really came . If [I]0-i had counted on what it would give [me]0-i to find [myself]0-i alone with [Miles]15-miles , [I]0-i speedily perceived , at least , that it would give [me]0-i a measure . No hour of [my]0-i stay in fact was so assailed with apprehensions as that of [my]0-i coming down to learn that [the carriage]939-the carriage containing [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose and [[my]0-i younger pupil]940-my younger pupil had already rolled out of the gates . Now [I]0-i _ was _ , [I]0-i said to [myself]0-i , face to face with the elements , and for much of the rest of the day , while [I]0-i fought [my]0-i weakness , [I]0-i could consider that [I]0-i had been supremely rash . It was a tighter place still than [I]0-i had yet turned round in ; all the more that , for the first time , [I]0-i could see in the aspect of [others]1039-others a confused reflection of the crisis . What had happened naturally caused [them]1039-others all to stare ; there was too little of the explained , throw out whatever [we]942-we might , in the suddenness of [[my]0-i colleague]223-my colleague ’s act . [The maids]830-the maids and [the men]945-the men looked blank ; the effect of which on [my]0-i nerves was an aggravation until [I]0-i saw the necessity of making it a positive aid . It was precisely , in short , by just clutching the helm that [I]0-i avoided total wreck ; and [I]0-i dare say that , to bear up at all , [I]0-i became , that morning , very grand and very dry . [I]0-i welcomed the consciousness that [I]0-i was charged with much to do , and [I]0-i caused it to be known as well that , left thus to [myself]0-i , [I]0-i was quite remarkably firm . [I]0-i wandered with that manner , for the next hour or two , all over [the place]1030-the place and looked , [I]0-i have no doubt , as if [I]0-i were ready for any onset . So , for the benefit of whom it might concern , [I]0-i paraded with a sick heart .

[The person it appeared least to concern]947-the person it appeared least to concern proved to be , till dinner , [little Miles]15-miles [himself]15-miles . [My]0-i perambulations had given [me]0-i , meanwhile , no glimpse of [him]15-miles , but they had tended to make more public the change taking place in [our]948-our relation as a consequence of [his]15-miles having at the piano , the day before , kept [me]0-i , in [Flora]16-flora ’s interest , so beguiled and befooled . The stamp of publicity had of course been fully given by [her]16-flora confinement and departure , and the change itself was now ushered in by [our]948-our nonobservance of the regular custom of [the schoolroom]85-the schoolroom . [He]15-miles had already disappeared when , on [my]0-i way down , [I]0-i pushed open [his]15-miles door , and [I]0-i learned below that [he]15-miles had breakfasted — in the presence of [a couple of the maids]950-a couple of the maids — with [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose and [[his]15-miles sister]425-his sister . [He]15-miles had then gone out , as [he]15-miles said , for a stroll ; than which nothing , [I]0-i reflected , could better have expressed [his]15-miles frank view of the abrupt transformation of [[my]0-i office]280-my office . What [he]15-miles would not permit [this office]953-this office to consist of was yet to be settled : there was a queer relief , at all events — [I]0-i mean for [myself]0-i in especial — in the renouncement of one pretension . If so much had sprung to the surface , [I]0-i scarce put it too strongly in saying that what had perhaps sprung highest was the absurdity of [our]954-our prolonging the fiction that [I]0-i had anything more to teach [him]15-miles . It sufficiently stuck out that , by tacit little tricks in which even more than [myself]0-i [he]15-miles carried out the care for [my]0-i dignity , [I]0-i had had to appeal to [him]15-miles to let [me]0-i off straining to meet [him]15-miles on the ground of [his]15-miles true capacity . [He]15-miles had at any rate [his]15-miles freedom now ; [I]0-i was never to touch it again ; as [I]0-i had amply shown , moreover , when , on [his]15-miles joining [me]0-i in [the schoolroom]85-the schoolroom the previous night , [I]0-i had uttered , on the subject of the interval just concluded , neither challenge nor hint . [I]0-i had too much , from this moment , [my]0-i other ideas . Yet when [he]15-miles at last arrived , the difficulty of applying them , the accumulations of [my]0-i problem , were brought straight [home]1024-home to [me]0-i by [the beautiful little presence on which what had occurred had as yet , for the eye]957-the beautiful little presence on which what had occurred had as yet , for the eye , dropped neither stain nor shadow .

To mark , for [the house]153-the house , the high state [I]0-i cultivated [I]0-i decreed that [my]0-i meals with [the boy]1078-the boy should be served , as [we]960-we called it , [downstairs]182-downstairs ; so that [I]0-i had been awaiting [him]15-miles in the ponderous pomp of [the room outside of the window of which [I]0-i had had from [Mrs. Grose]14-mrs. grose]962-the room outside of the window of which i had had from mrs. grose , that first scared Sunday , [my]0-i flash of something it would scarce have done to call light . Here at present [I]0-i felt afresh — for [I]0-i had felt it again and again — how [my]0-i equilibrium depended on the success of [my]0-i rigid will , the will to shut [my]0-i eyes as tight as possible to the truth that what [I]0-i had to deal with was , revoltingly , against nature . [I]0-i could only get on at all by taking “ nature ”[0-i] into [my]0-i confidence and [my]0-i account , by treating [my]0-i monstrous ordeal as a push in a direction unusual , of course , and unpleasant , but demanding , after all , for a fair front , only another turn of the screw of ordinary human virtue . No attempt , nonetheless , could well require more tact than just this attempt to supply , one ’s self , _ all _ the nature . How could [I]0-i put even a little of that article into a suppression of reference to what had occurred ? How , on the other hand , could [I]0-i make reference without a new plunge into the hideous obscure ? Well , a sort of answer , after a time , had come to [me]0-i , and it was so far confirmed as that [I]0-i was met , incontestably , by the quickened vision of what was rare in [[my]0-i little companion]963-my little companion . It was indeed as if [he]963-my little companion had found even now — as [he]963-my little companion had so often found at lessons — still some other delicate way to ease [me]0-i off . Was n’t there light in the fact which , as [we]964-we shared [our]964-we solitude , broke out with a specious glitter it had never yet quite worn?—the fact that ( opportunity aiding , precious opportunity which had now come ) it would be preposterous , with [a child so endowed]965-a child so endowed , to forego the help one might wrest from absolute intelligence ? What had [his]963-my little companion intelligence been given [him]963-my little companion for but to save [him]963-my little companion ? Might n’t one , to reach [his]963-my little companion mind , risk the stretch of an angular arm over [his]963-my little companion character ? It was as if , when [we]964-we were face to face in [the dining room]348-the dining room , [he]963-my little companion had literally shown [me]0-i the way . The roast mutton was on the table , and [I]0-i had dispensed with attendance . [Miles]15-miles , before [he]963-my little companion sat down , stood a moment with [his]963-my little companion hands in [his]963-my little companion pockets and looked at the joint , on which [he]963-my little companion seemed on the point of passing some humorous judgment . But what [he]963-my little companion presently produced was : “ [I]963-my little companion say , [[my]963-my little companion dear]1145-my dear , is [she]1145-my dear really very awfully ill ? ”[963-my little companion]

“ [Little Flora]47-little flora ? Not so bad but that [she]1145-my dear ’ll presently be better . [London]2-london will set [her]1145-my dear up . [Bly]13-bly had ceased to agree with [her]1145-my dear . Come here and take [your]963-my little companion mutton . ”[963-my little companion]

[He]963-my little companion alertly obeyed [me]0-i , carried the plate carefully to [his]963-my little companion seat , and , when [he]963-my little companion was established , went on . “ Did [Bly]13-bly disagree with [her]1145-my dear so terribly suddenly ? ”[963-my little companion]

“ Not so suddenly as [you]963-my little companion might think . [One]94-one had seen it coming on . ”[963-my little companion]

“ Then why did n’t [you]963-my little companion get [her]1145-my dear off before ? ”[963-my little companion]

“ Before what ? ”[963-my little companion]

“ Before [she]1145-my dear became too ill to travel . ”[963-my little companion]

[I]0-i found [myself]0-i prompt . “ [She]1145-my dear ’s _ not _ too ill to travel : [she]1145-my dear only might have become so if [she]1145-my dear had stayed . This was just the moment to seize . The journey will dissipate the influence”—oh[0-i] , [I]0-i was grand!—“and carry it off . ”[0-i]

“ [I]963-my little companion see , [I]963-my little companion see”—Miles[963-my little companion] , for that matter , was grand , too . [He]963-my little companion settled to [his]963-my little companion repast with the charming little “ table manner ”[963-my little companion] that , from the day of [his]963-my little companion arrival , had relieved [me]0-i of all grossness of admonition . Whatever [he]963-my little companion had been driven from [school]313-school for , it was not for ugly feeding . [He]963-my little companion was irreproachable , as always , today ; but [he]963-my little companion was unmistakably more conscious . [He]963-my little companion was discernibly trying to take for granted more things than [he]963-my little companion found , without assistance , quite easy ; and [he]963-my little companion dropped into peaceful silence while [he]963-my little companion felt [his]963-my little companion situation . [Our]968-we meal was of the briefest — mine a vain pretense , and [I]0-i had the things immediately removed . While this was done [Miles]15-miles stood again with [his]963-my little companion hands in [his]963-my little companion little pockets and [his]963-my little companion back to [me]0-i — stood and looked out of the wide window through which , that other day , [I]0-i had seen what pulled [me]0-i up . [We]968-we continued silent while [the maid]969-the maid was with [us]968-we — as silent , it whimsically occurred to [me]0-i , as [some young couple who , on [their]970-some young couple who , on their wedding journey , at the inn , feel shy in the presence of the waiter wedding journey , at [the inn]971-the inn , feel shy in the presence of [the waiter]972-the waiter]970-some young couple who , on their wedding journey , at the inn , feel shy in the presence of the waiter . [He]963-my little companion turned round only when [the waiter]972-the waiter had left [us]968-we . “ Well — so [we]968-we ’re alone ! ”[963-my little companion]

XXIII

“ Oh , more or less . ”[0-i] [I]0-i fancy [my]0-i smile was pale . “ Not absolutely . [We]968-we should n’t like that ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i went on .

“ No — [I]0-i suppose [we]968-we should n’t . Of course [we]968-we have [the others]66-the others . ”[0-i]

“ [We]968-we have [the others]66-the others — [we]968-we have indeed [the others]66-the others , ”[0-i] [I]0-i concurred .

“ Yet even though [we]968-we have [them]66-the others , ”[963-my little companion] [he]963-my little companion returned , still with [his]963-my little companion hands in [his]963-my little companion pockets and planted there in front of [me]0-i , “ [they]66-the others do n’t much count , do [they]66-the others ? ”[963-my little companion]

[I]0-i made the best of it , but [I]0-i felt wan . “ It depends on what [you]963-my little companion call ‘ much ’ ! ”[0-i]

“ Yes”—with[963-my little companion] all accommodation—“everything depends ! ”[0-i] On this , however , [he]963-my little companion faced to the window again and presently reached it with [his]963-my little companion vague , restless , cogitating step . [He]963-my little companion remained there awhile , with [his]963-my little companion forehead against the glass , in contemplation of the stupid shrubs [I]0-i knew and the dull things of [November]48-november . [I]0-i had always [my]0-i hypocrisy of “ work , ”[0-i] behind which , now , [I]0-i gained the sofa . Steadying [myself]0-i with it there as [I]0-i had repeatedly done at those moments of torment that [I]0-i have described as the moments of [my]0-i knowing [the children]1088-the children to be given to something from which [I]0-i was barred , [I]0-i sufficiently obeyed [my]0-i habit of being prepared for the worst . But an extraordinary impression dropped on [me]0-i as [I]0-i extracted a meaning from [the boy]1078-the boy ’s embarrassed back — none other than the impression that [I]0-i was not barred now . This inference grew in a few minutes to sharp intensity and seemed bound up with the direct perception that it was positively _ [he]963-my little companion _ who was . The frames and squares of the great window were a kind of image , for [him]963-my little companion , of a kind of failure . [I]0-i felt that [I]0-i saw [him]963-my little companion , at any rate , shut in or shut out . [He]963-my little companion was admirable , but not comfortable : [I]0-i took it in with a throb of hope . Was n’t [he]963-my little companion looking , through the haunted pane , for something [he]963-my little companion could n’t see?—and was n’t it the first time in the whole business that [he]963-my little companion had known such a lapse ? The first , the very first : [I]0-i found it a splendid portent . It made [him]963-my little companion anxious , though [he]963-my little companion watched [himself]963-my little companion ; [he]963-my little companion had been anxious all day and , even while in [his]963-my little companion usual sweet little manner [he]963-my little companion sat at table , had needed all [his]963-my little companion small strange genius to give it a gloss . When [he]963-my little companion at last turned round to meet [me]0-i , it was almost as if [this genius]976-this genius had succumbed . “ Well , [I]976-this genius think [I]976-this genius ’m glad Bly agrees with _ [me]976-this genius ! _ ”[976-this genius]

“ [You]963-my little companion would certainly seem to have seen , these twenty - four hours , a good deal more of it than for some time before . [I]0-i hope , ”[0-i] [I]0-i went on bravely , “ that [you]963-my little companion ’ve been enjoying [yourself]963-my little companion . ”[0-i]

“ Oh , yes , [I]976-this genius ’ve been ever so far ; all round about — miles and miles away . [I]976-this genius ’ve never been so free . ”[976-this genius]

[He]963-my little companion had really a manner of [his]963-my little companion own , and [I]0-i could only try to keep up with [him]963-my little companion . “ Well , do [you]963-my little companion like it ? ”[0-i]

[He]963-my little companion stood there smiling ; then at last [he]963-my little companion put into two words—“Do _ you?_”—more[963-my little companion] discrimination than [I]0-i had ever heard two words contain . Before [I]0-i had time to deal with that , however , [he]963-my little companion continued as if with the sense that this was an impertinence to be softened . “ Nothing could be more charming than the way [you]0-i take it , for of course if [we]1407-we ’re alone together now it ’s [you]0-i that are alone most . But [I]963-my little companion hope , ”[963-my little companion] [he]963-my little companion threw in , “ [you]0-i do n’t particularly mind ! ”[963-my little companion]

“ Having to do with [you]963-my little companion ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i asked . “ [[My]0-i dear child]1408-my dear child , how can [I]0-i help minding ? Though [I]0-i ’ve renounced all claim to [your]0-i company — [you’re]0-i so beyond [me]0-i — [I]0-i at least greatly enjoy it . What else should [I]0-i stay on for ? ”[0-i]

[He]963-my little companion looked at [me]0-i more directly , and the expression of [his]963-my little companion face , graver now , struck [me]0-i as the most beautiful [I]0-i had ever found in it . “ [You]963-my little companion stay on just for _ that ? _ ”[963-my little companion]

“ Certainly . [I]0-i stay on as [[your]0-i friend]1409-your friend and from the tremendous interest [I]0-i take in [you]0-i till something can be done for [you]0-i that may be more worth [your]0-i while . That need n’t surprise [you]0-i . ”[0-i] [My]0-i voice trembled so that [I]0-i felt it impossible to suppress the shake . “ Do n’t [you]0-i remember how [I]0-i told [you]0-i , when [I]0-i came and sat on [your]0-i bed the night of the storm , that there was nothing in [the world]185-the world [I]0-i would n’t do for [you]0-i ? ”[0-i]

“ Yes , yes ! ”[977-he] [He]977-he , on [his]977-he side , more and more visibly nervous , had a tone to master ; but [he]977-he was so much more successful than [I]0-i that , laughing out through [his]977-he gravity , [he]977-he could pretend [we]978-we were pleasantly jesting . “ Only that , [I]977-he think , was to get [me]977-he to do something for _ [you]0-i ! _ ”[977-he]

“ It was partly to get [you]977-he to do something , ”[0-i] [I]0-i conceded . “ But , [you]977-he know , [you]977-he did n’t do it . ”[0-i]

“ Oh , yes , ”[977-he] [he]977-he said with the brightest superficial eagerness , “ [you]0-i wanted [me]977-he to tell [you]0-i something . ”[977-he]

“ That ’s it . Out , straight out . What [you]977-he have on [your]977-he mind , [you]977-he know . ”[977-he]

“ Ah , then , is _ that _ what [you]0-i ’ve stayed over for ? ”[977-he]

[He]977-he spoke with a gaiety through which [I]0-i could still catch the finest little quiver of resentful passion ; but [I]0-i ca n’t begin to express the effect upon [me]0-i of an implication of surrender even so faint . It was as if what [I]0-i had yearned for had come at last only to astonish [me]0-i . “ Well , yes — [I]977-he may as well make a clean breast of it , it was precisely for that . ”[977-he]

[He]977-he waited so long that [I]0-i supposed it for the purpose of repudiating the assumption on which [my]0-i action had been founded ; but what [he]977-he finally said was : “ Do [you]0-i mean now — here ? ”[977-he]

“ There could n’t be [a better place]1411-a better place or time . ”[977-he] [He]977-he looked round [him]977-he uneasily , and [I]0-i had the rare — oh , the queer!—impression of the very first symptom [I]0-i had seen in [him]977-he of the approach of immediate fear . It was as if [he]977-he were suddenly afraid of [me]0-i — which struck [me]0-i indeed as perhaps the best thing to make [him]977-he . Yet in the very pang of the effort [I]0-i felt it vain to try sternness , and [I]0-i heard [myself]0-i the next instant so gentle as to be almost grotesque . “ [You]977-he want so to go out again ? ”[0-i]

“ Awfully ! ”[977-he] [He]977-he smiled at [me]0-i heroically , and the touching little bravery of it was enhanced by [his]977-he actually flushing with pain . [He]977-he had picked up [his]977-he hat , which [he]977-he had brought in , and stood twirling it in a way that gave [me]0-i , even as [I]0-i was just nearly reaching port , a perverse horror of what [I]0-i was doing . To do it in _ any _ way was an act of violence , for what did it consist of but the obtrusion of the idea of grossness and guilt on [a small helpless creature who had been for [me]0-i a revelation of the possibilities of beautiful intercourse]979-a small helpless creature who had been for me a revelation of the possibilities of beautiful intercourse ? Was n’t it base to create for [a being so exquisite a mere alien awkwardness]980-a being so exquisite a mere alien awkwardness ? [I]0-i suppose [I]0-i now read into [our]981-we situation a clearness it could n’t have had at the time , for [I]0-i seem to see [our]981-we poor eyes already lighted with some spark of a prevision of the anguish that was to come . So [we]981-we circled about , with terrors and scruples , like fighters not daring to close . But it was for [each other]284-each other [we]981-we feared ! That kept [us]981-we a little longer suspended and unbruised . “ [I]15-miles ’ll tell [you]0-i everything , ”[15-miles] [Miles]15-miles said—“I mean [I]0-i ’ll tell [you]0-i anything [you]0-i like . [You]0-i ’ll stay on with [me]0-i , and [we]981-we shall both be all right , and [I]0-i _ will _ tell [you]0-i — [I]0-i _ will _ . But not now . ”[0-i]

“ Why not now ? ”[0-i]

[My]0-i insistence turned [him]15-miles from [me]0-i and kept [him]15-miles once more at [his]15-miles window in a silence during which , between [us]981-we , [you]983-you might have heard a pin drop . Then [he]15-miles was before [me]0-i again with the air of [a person for whom , outside , someone who had frankly to be reckoned with]984-a person for whom , outside , someone who had frankly to be reckoned with was waiting . “ [I]15-miles have to see [Luke]42-luke . ”[15-miles]

[I]0-i had not yet reduced [him]15-miles to quite so vulgar a lie , and [I]0-i felt proportionately ashamed . But , horrible as it was , [his]15-miles lies made up [my]0-i truth . [I]0-i achieved thoughtfully a few loops of [my]0-i knitting . “ Well , then , go to [Luke]42-luke , and [I]0-i ’ll wait for what [you]15-miles promise . Only , in return for that , satisfy , before [you]15-miles leave [me]0-i , one very much smaller request . ”[0-i]

[He]15-miles looked as if [he]15-miles felt [he]15-miles had succeeded enough to be able still a little to bargain . “ Very much smaller — ? ”[15-miles]

“ Yes , a mere fraction of the whole . Tell [me”—oh]0-i[0-i] , [my]0-i work preoccupied [me]0-i , and [I]0-i was offhand!—“if , yesterday afternoon , from the table in [the hall]78-the hall , [you]15-miles took , [you]15-miles know , [my]0-i letter . ”[0-i]

XXIV

[My]0-i sense of how [he]15-miles received this suffered for a minute from something that [I]0-i can describe only as a fierce split of [my]0-i attention — a stroke that at first , as [I]0-i sprang straight up , reduced [me]0-i to the mere blind movement of getting hold of [him]15-miles , drawing [him]15-miles close , and , while [I]0-i just fell for support against the nearest piece of furniture , instinctively keeping [him]15-miles with [his]15-miles back to the window . The appearance was full upon [us]985-us that [I]0-i had already had to deal with here : [Peter Quint]22-quint had come into view like [a sentinel]986-a sentinel before [a prison]987-a prison . The next thing [I]0-i saw was that , from outside , [he]15-miles had reached the window , and then [I]0-i knew that , close to the glass and glaring in through it , [he]15-miles offered once more to [the room]56-the room [his]15-miles white face of damnation . It represents but grossly what took place within [me]0-i at the sight to say that on the second [my]0-i decision was made ; yet [I]0-i believe that [no woman]989-no woman so overwhelmed ever in so short a time recovered [her]989-no woman grasp of the _ act _ . It came to [me]0-i in the very horror of the immediate presence that the act would be , seeing and facing what [I]0-i saw and faced , to keep [the boy]1078-the boy [himself]1078-the boy unaware . The inspiration — [I]0-i can call it by no other name — was that [I]0-i felt how voluntarily , how transcendently , [I]0-i _ might _ . It was like fighting with a demon for [a human soul]991-a human soul , and when [I]0-i had fairly so appraised it [I]0-i saw how the human soul — held out , in the tremor of [my]0-i hands , at arm ’s length — had a perfect dew of sweat on a lovely childish forehead . The face that was close to [mine]0-i was as white as the face against the glass , and out of it presently came a sound , not low nor weak , but as if from much further away , that [I]0-i drank like a waft of fragrance .

“ Yes — [I]0-i took it . ”[0-i]

At this , with a moan of joy , [I]0-i enfolded , [I]0-i drew [him]1078-the boy close ; and while [I]0-i held [him]1078-the boy to [my]0-i breast , where [I]0-i could feel in the sudden fever of [his]1078-the boy little body the tremendous pulse of [his]1078-the boy little heart , [I]0-i kept [my]0-i eyes on the thing at the window and saw [it]992-it move and shift its posture . [I]0-i have likened [it]992-it to [a sentinel]986-a sentinel , but its slow wheel , for a moment , was rather the prowl of a baffled beast . [My]0-i present quickened courage , however , was such that , not too much to let it through , [I]0-i had to shade , as it were , [my]0-i flame . Meanwhile the glare of the face was again at the window , [the scoundrel fixed as if to watch and wait]994-the scoundrel fixed as if to watch and wait . It was the very confidence that [I]0-i might now defy [him]1078-the boy , as well as the positive certitude , by this time , of [the child]1015-the child ’s unconsciousness , that made [me]0-i go on . “ What did [you]1078-the boy take it for ? ”[0-i]

“ To see what [you]1078-the boy said about [me]0-i . ”[0-i]

“ [You]1078-the boy opened the letter ? ”[0-i]

“ [I]0-i opened it . ”[0-i]

[My]0-i eyes were now , as [I]0-i held [him]1078-the boy off a little again , on [Miles]15-miles ’s own face , in which the collapse of mockery showed [me]0-i how complete was the ravage of uneasiness . What was prodigious was that at last , by [my]0-i success , [his]1078-the boy sense was sealed and [his]1078-the boy communication stopped : [he]1078-the boy knew that [he]1078-the boy was in presence , but knew not of what , and knew still less that [I]0-i also was and that [I]0-i did know . And what did this strain of trouble matter when [my]0-i eyes went back to the window only to see that the air was clear again and — by [my]0-i personal triumph — the influence quenched ? There was nothing there . [I]0-i felt that the cause was [mine]0-i and that [I]0-i should surely get _ all _ . “ And [you]1078-the boy found nothing!”—I[0-i] let [my]0-i elation out .

[He]1078-the boy gave the most mournful , thoughtful little headshake . “ Nothing . ”[1078-the boy]

“ Nothing , nothing ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i almost shouted in [my]0-i joy .

“ Nothing , nothing , ”[1078-the boy] [he]1078-the boy sadly repeated .

[I]0-i kissed [his]1078-the boy forehead ; it was drenched . “ So what have [you]1078-the boy done with it ? ”[0-i]

“ [I]1078-the boy ’ve burned it . ”[1078-the boy]

“ Burned it ? ”[0-i] It was now or never . “ Is that what [you]1078-the boy did at [school]313-school ? ”[0-i]

Oh , what this brought up ! “ At school ? ”[1078-the boy]

“ Did [you]1078-the boy take letters?—or other things ? ”[1078-the boy]

“ Other things ? ”[1078-the boy] [He]1078-the boy appeared now to be thinking of something far off and that reached [him]1078-the boy only through the pressure of [his]1078-the boy anxiety . Yet it did reach [him]1078-the boy . “ Did [I]1078-the boy _ steal ? _ ”[1078-the boy]

[I]0-i felt [myself]0-i redden to the roots of [my]0-i hair as well as wonder if it were more strange to put to [a gentleman]90-a gentleman such a question or to see [him]1078-the boy take it with allowances that gave the very distance of [his]1078-the boy fall in [the world]185-the world . “ Was it for that [you]1078-the boy might n’t go back ? ”[1078-the boy]

The only thing [he]1078-the boy felt was rather a dreary little surprise . “ Did [you]1078-the boy know [I]1078-the boy might n’t go back ? ”[1078-the boy]

“ [I]1078-the boy know everything . ”[1078-the boy]

[He]1078-the boy gave [me]0-i at this the longest and strangest look . “ Everything ? ”[1078-the boy]

“ Everything . Therefore _ did _ [you]1078-the boy — ? ”[1078-the boy] But [I]0-i could n’t say it again .

[Miles]15-miles could , very simply . “ No . [I]15-miles did n’t steal . ”[15-miles]

[My]0-i face must have shown [him]1078-the boy [I]0-i believed [him]1078-the boy utterly ; yet [my]0-i hands — but it was for pure tenderness — shook [him]1078-the boy as if to ask [him]1078-the boy why , if it was all for nothing , [he]1078-the boy had condemned [me]0-i to months of torment . “ What then did [you]1078-the boy do ? ”[1078-the boy]

[He]1078-the boy looked in vague pain all round the top of [the room]56-the room and drew [his]1078-the boy breath , two or three times over , as if with difficulty . [He]1078-the boy might have been standing at [the bottom of [the sea]1000-the sea]999-the bottom of the sea and raising [his]1078-the boy eyes to some faint green twilight . “ Well — [I]1078-the boy said things . ”[1078-the boy]

“ Only that ? ”[1078-the boy]

“ [They]1414-they thought it was enough ! ”[1078-the boy]

“ To turn [you]1078-the boy out for ? ”[1078-the boy]

Never , truly , had [a person “ turned out ”]1415-a person “ turned out ”[1078-the boy] shown so little to explain it as [this little person]1001-this little person ! [He]1078-the boy appeared to weigh [my]0-i question , but in a manner quite detached and almost helpless . “ Well , [I]1078-the boy suppose [I]1078-the boy ought n’t . ”[1078-the boy]

“ But to whom did [you]1078-the boy say [them]1416-them ? ”[1078-the boy]

[He]1078-the boy evidently tried to remember , but it dropped — [he]1078-the boy had lost it . “ [I]1078-the boy do n’t know ! ”[1078-the boy]

[He]1078-the boy almost smiled at [me]0-i in the desolation of [his]1078-the boy surrender , which was indeed practically , by this time , so complete that [I]0-i ought to have left it there . But [I]0-i was infatuated — [I]0-i was blind with victory , though even then the very effect that was to have brought [him]1078-the boy so much nearer was already that of added separation . “ Was it to [everyone]75-everyone ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i asked .

“ No ; it was only to — ”[1078-the boy] But [he]1078-the boy gave a sick little headshake . “ [I]1078-the boy do n’t remember [their]75-everyone names . ”[1078-the boy]

“ Were [they]75-everyone then so many ? ”[1078-the boy]

“ No — only a few . Those [I]1078-the boy liked . ”[1078-the boy]

Those [he]1078-the boy liked ? [I]0-i seemed to float not into clearness , but into a darker obscure , and within a minute there had come to [me]0-i out of [my]0-i very pity the appalling alarm of [his]1078-the boy being perhaps innocent . It was for the instant confounding and bottomless , for if [he]1078-the boy _ were _ innocent , what then on earth was _ [I]0-i ? _ [Paralyzed]49-paralyzed , while it lasted , by the mere brush of the question , [I]0-i let [him]1078-the boy go a little , so that , with a deep - drawn sigh , [he]1078-the boy turned away from [me]0-i again ; which , as [he]1078-the boy faced toward the clear window , [I]0-i suffered , feeling that [I]0-i had nothing now there to keep [him]1078-the boy from . “ And did [they]1418-they repeat what [you]1078-the boy said ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i went on after a moment .

[He]1078-the boy was soon at some distance from [me]0-i , still breathing hard and again with the air , though now without anger for it , of being confined against [his]1078-the boy will . Once more , as [he]1078-the boy had done before , [he]1078-the boy looked up at the dim day as if , of what had hitherto sustained [him]1078-the boy , nothing was left but an unspeakable anxiety . “ Oh , yes , ”[1078-the boy] [he]1078-the boy nevertheless replied—“they must have repeated them . To those _ [they]1418-they _ liked , ”[1078-the boy] [he]1078-the boy added .

There was , somehow , less of it than [I]0-i had expected ; but [I]0-i turned it over . “ And these things came round — ? ”[0-i]

“ To [the masters]1419-the masters ? Oh , yes ! ”[1078-the boy] [he]1078-the boy answered very simply . “ But [I]1078-the boy did n’t know [they]1418-they ’d tell . ”[1078-the boy]

“ [The masters]1419-the masters ? [They]1419-the masters didn’t — [they’ve]1419-the masters never told . That ’s why [I]1078-the boy ask [you]1078-the boy . ”[1078-the boy]

[He]1078-the boy turned to [me]0-i again [his]1078-the boy little beautiful fevered face . “ Yes , it was too bad . ”[1078-the boy]

“ Too bad ? ”[1078-the boy]

“ What [I]1078-the boy suppose [I]1078-the boy sometimes said . To write [home]1024-home . ”[1078-the boy]

[I]0-i ca n’t name the exquisite pathos of the contradiction given to such a speech by [such a speaker]1002-such a speaker ; [I]0-i only know that the next instant [I]0-i heard [myself]0-i throw off with homely force : “ Stuff and nonsense ! ”[0-i] But the next after that [I]0-i must have sounded stern enough . “ What _ were _ these things ? ”[0-i]

[My]0-i sternness was all for [[his]1078-the boy judge]1003-his judge , [[his]1078-the boy executioner]1004-his executioner ; yet it made [him]1078-the boy avert [himself]1078-the boy again , and that movement made _ [me]0-i _ , with a single bound and an irrepressible cry , spring straight upon [him]1078-the boy . For there again , against the glass , as if to blight [his]1078-the boy confession and stay [his]1078-the boy answer , was the hideous author of [our]1005-our woe — the white face of damnation . [I]0-i felt a sick swim at the drop of [my]0-i victory and all the return of [my]0-i battle , so that the wildness of [my]0-i veritable leap only served as a great betrayal . [I]0-i saw [him]1078-the boy , from the midst of [my]0-i act , meet it with a divination , and on the perception that even now [he]1078-the boy only guessed , and that the window was still to [his]1078-the boy own eyes free , [I]0-i let the impulse flame up to convert the climax of [his]1078-the boy dismay into the very proof of [his]1078-the boy liberation . “ No more , no more , no more ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i shrieked , as [I]0-i tried to press [him]1078-the boy against [me]0-i , to [[my]0-i visitant]1006-my visitant .

“ Is [she]1006-my visitant _ here ? _ ”[15-miles] [Miles]15-miles panted as [he]1078-the boy caught with [his]1078-the boy sealed eyes the direction of [my]0-i words . Then as [his]1078-the boy strange “ [she]1006-my visitant ”[1078-the boy] staggered [me]0-i and , with a gasp , [I]0-i echoed it , “ [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel , [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel ! ”[1078-the boy] [he]1078-the boy with a sudden fury gave [me]0-i back .

[I]0-i seized , stupefied , [his]1078-the boy supposition — some sequel to what [we]1007-we had done to [Flora]47-little flora , but this made [me]0-i only want to show [him]1078-the boy that it was better still than that . “ It ’s not [Miss Jessel]28-miss jessel ! But it ’s at the window — straight before [us]1007-we . It ’s _ there_—the coward horror , there for the last time ! ”[0-i]

At this , after a second in which [his]1078-the boy head made the movement of a baffled dog ’s on a scent and then gave a frantic little shake for air and light , [he]1078-the boy was at [me]0-i in a white rage , bewildered , glaring vainly over the place and missing wholly , though it now , to [my]0-i sense , filled [the room]56-the room like the taste of poison , the wide , overwhelming presence . “ It ’s _ [he]1078-the boy ? _ ”[1078-the boy]

[I]0-i was so determined to have all [my]0-i proof that [I]0-i flashed into ice to challenge [him]1078-the boy . “ Whom do [you]0-i mean by ‘ [he]1078-the boy ’ ? ”[0-i]

“ [Peter Quint]22-quint — [you]0-i devil ! ”[1078-the boy] [His]1078-the boy face gave again , round [the room]56-the room , its convulsed supplication . “ _ Where ? _ ”[1078-the boy]

They are in [my]0-i ears still , [his]1078-the boy supreme surrender of the name and [his]1078-the boy tribute to [my]0-i devotion . “ What does [he]1078-the boy matter now , [my]0-i own?—what will [he]1078-the boy _ ever _ matter ? _ [I]0-i _ have [you]15-miles , ”[0-i] [I]0-i launched at the beast , “ but [he]1078-the boy has lost [you]15-miles forever ! ”[0-i] Then , for the demonstration of [my]0-i work , “ There , _ there ! _ ”[0-i] [I]0-i said to [Miles]15-miles .

But [he]15-miles had already jerked straight round , stared , glared again , and seen but the quiet day . With the stroke of the loss [I]0-i was so proud of [he]15-miles uttered the cry of [a creature hurled over an abyss]1010-a creature hurled over an abyss , and the grasp with which [I]0-i recovered [him]15-miles might have been that of catching [him]15-miles in [his]15-miles fall . [I]0-i caught [him]15-miles , yes , [I]0-i held [him]15-miles — it may be imagined with what a passion ; but at the end of a minute [I]0-i began to feel what it truly was that [I]0-i held . [We]1011-we were alone with the quiet day , and [his]15-miles little heart , dispossessed , had stopped .
